channel.title: Leetcode on Ji's place
channel.description: Recent content in Leetcode on Ji's place

item.title: 113-Path Sum II
item.description: Description Given a binary tree and a sum, find all root-to-leaf paths where each path’s sum equals the given sum. Note: A leaf is a node with no children.

item.title: 27 - Remove Element
item.description: Description Given an array nums and a value val, remove all instances of that value in-place and return the new length. Do not allocate extra space for another array, you must do this by modifying the input array in-place with O(1) extra memory.
